Verses: 1 karththaraith Thudhippadhum, Unnadhamaanavare, Umadhu Naamaththaik Keerththanampannuvadhum,
2 paththunarambu Veenaiyinaalum, Thamburuvinaalum, Dhiyaanaththodu Vaasikkum Suramandalaththinaalum,
3 kaalaiyile Umadhu Kirubaiyaiyum, Iravile Umadhu Saththiyaththaiyum Arivippadhum Nalamaayirukkum.
4 karththaave, Umadhu Seygaigalaal Ennai Magizhchchiyaakkineer, Umadhu Karaththin Kiriyaigalinimiththam Aanandha Saththamiduven.
5 karththaave, Umadhu Kiriyaigal Evvalavu Magaththuvamaanavaigal! Umadhu Yosanaigal Magaa Aazhamaanavaigal.
6 mirugagunamulla Manushan Adhai Ariyaan; Moodan Adhai Unaraan.
7 dhunmaarkkar Pullaippole Thazhaiththu, Akkiramakkaarar Yaavarum Sezhikkumbodhu, Adhu Avargal Endrendraikkum Azhindhupovadharke Edhuvaagum.
9 karththaave, Umadhu Saththurukkal Azhivaargal; Umadhu Saththurukkal Azhindhepovaargal; Sagala Akkiramakkaararum Sidharundupovaargal.
10 en Kombaik Kaandaamirugaththin Kombaippola Uyarththuveer; Pudhu Enneyaal Abishegampannappadugiren.
11 en Saththurukkalukku Neriduvadhai En Kan Kaanum; Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbugira Dhunmaarkkarukku Neriduvadhai En Kaadhu Ketkum.
12 needhimaan Panaiyaippol Sezhiththu, Leebanonilulla Kedhuruvaippol Valaruvaan.
13 karththarudaiya Aalayaththile Naattappattavargal Engal Dhevanudaiya Piraagaarangalil Sezhiththiruppaargal.
14 karththar Uththamarendrum, En Kanmalaiyaagiya Avaridaththil Aneedhiyillaiyendrum, Vilangappannumpadi,
15 avargal Mudhirvayadhilum Kani Thandhu, Pushtiyum Pasumaiyumaayiruppaargal.
